revised_title: The Sauropod Dinosaur from the Lower Jurassic Kota Formation of India
tldr: The article discusses the discovery and study of a sauropod dinosaur from the Lower Jurassic Kota formation in India. The dinosaur, named Barapasaurus tagorei, is the earliest known sauropod with adequate material. The article provides a diagnosis of its characters and comments on those typical of sauropods. It also briefly mentions the importance of the discovery in understanding the geographical distribution of dinosaurs during Lower and Middle Jurassic times.
